title: Kershaw, Dodgers force Game 5 against Mets
text: Kershaw, Dodgers force Game 5 against Mets Wednesday, 14 October 2015 (3 minutes ago) Kershaw, Dodgers force Game 5 against Mets Sports Illustrated's Ben Reiter and Jon Tayler discuss the New York Mets 13-7 win over the Los Angeles Dodgers in Game 3 of the NLDS and if Clayton Kershaw and Zack Greinke can pull L.A. out of this hole. Recent related news Clayton Kershaw had heard all about his postseason struggles, his seventh-inning meltdowns, his lack of a signature game. Maybe he won't be hearing it quite... L.A. Times 1 hour ago - Sports Kershaw allows just one run over seven innings. USATODAY.com 1 hour ago - Sports Whatever retribution the New York Mets might wish to exact upon Chase Utley will have to wait. Although Utley had a career .333 batting average against Mets... L.A. Times 1 day ago - Europe Also reported by • guardian.co.uk · Jacob deGrom strikes out career-high 13 · Game two of five-game series on Saturday at Dodger Stadium Daniel Murphy homered and Jacob deGrom struck out... guardian.co.uk 4 days ago - US Also reported by • L.A. Times Clayton Kershaw will start Game 1 of the upcoming National League Division Series for the Los Angeles Dodgers against the New York Mets.
